title: KLK11-Related Disorder of Cornification Presenting as Inflammatory Skin Disease: A Familial Case Report and Literature Review
details: W Eiumtrakul, S Wittayakornrerk, P Wongkittichote… - … journal of medical genetics. Part A
abstract: Mendelian disorders of cornification (MeDoC) are a group of heterogeneous inherited skin disorders characterized by hyperkeratosis or scaling. Clinical assessment and skin biopsy are primarily used to differentiate MeDoC from …
